long_description: With its half-mesh back, short torso and supportive cups, the Stohlquist Cruiser PFD offers women a very comfortable fit while paddling, especially with high-backed kayak seats. Unique cross-chest cinch strap totally eliminates annoying ride-up and keeps flotation in place, to keep you floating high in the water. Stretchy, adjustable neoprene shoulders follow your movement without getting in the way, and they're soft against skin when you're wearing a swimsuit. Mesh side panels with wide side cinch-straps secure the fit and promote airflow. Durable Cordura(R) nylon shell resists abrasion and UV rays for long-lasting service. Women's Stohlquist Cruiser PFD has reflective accents on front and back to enhance visibility. Zippered bellows pockets with drainage ports store essential gear; rear 4-way lash tab lets you attach safety equipment.
short_description: With its half-mesh back, short torso and supportive cups, the Stohlquist Cruiser PFD offers women a very comfortable fit while paddling, especially with high-backed kayak seats.
